comment.author: 23061408@N04
comment._content: It's posed. The shirt is crisp from the laundry (and is too good to be wearing while working on machine tools), while her hands are unnaturally clean. Still, a nice picture.

comment._content: This guy knew how to light - excellent.

comment.author: 7296896@N08
comment._content:
husbands at war, wifes working. A period I did not know (born in 1950), but  having heard so much of this.
Your library is very moving, for all what it shows, and the very historical memories.

comment.author: 32394499@N03
comment._content: Excelente fotografía de claroscuro.Tanto la mujer como la máquina están muy bien modeladas por la luz.La posición central del motivo sugiere el carácter estático de la escena.
